BurnFeePaid(address,address,uint256,uint.details: This can be emitted multiple times for a single Kresko asset burn.

params.account: The address of the account burning the Kresko asset.
params.paymentAmount: The amount of the payment collateral asset that was paid.
params.paymentCollateralAsset: The address of the collateral asset used to pay the burn fee.
params.paymentValue: The USD value of the payment.

params.burnFee: The new burn fee raw value.

CollateralAssetAdded(address,uint256,add.details: Can only be emitted once for a given collateral asset.

params.collateralAsset: The address of the collateral asset.
The address of the collateral asset.

params.account: The address of the account depositing collateral.
params.amount: The amount of the collateral asset that was deposited.
params.collateralAsset: The address of the collateral asset.

params.account: The address of the account withdrawing collateral.
params.amount: The amount of the collateral asset that was withdrawn.
params.collateralAsset: The address of the collateral asset.

KreskoAssetAdded(address,string,uint256,.details: Can only be emitted once for a given Kresko asset.

params.kreskoAsset: The address of the Kresko asset.
params.marketCapLimit: The initial market capitalization USD limit.
params.symbol: The symbol of the Kresko asset.

params.account: The address of the account burning the Kresko asset.
params.amount: The amount of the Kresko asset that was burned.
params.kreskoAsset: The address of the Kresko asset.

params.account: The address of the account minting the Kresko asset.
params.amount: The amount of the Kresko asset that was minted.
params.kreskoAsset: The address of the Kresko asset.
The address of the Kresko asset.

params.liquidationIncentiveMultiplier: The new liquidation incentive multiplier raw value.

params.account: The address of the account being liquidated.
params.collateralSent: The amount of the seized collateral asset being seized from the account by the liquidator.
params.repayAmount: The amount of the repay Kresko asset being paid back to the protocol by the liquidator.
params.repayKreskoAsset: The address of the Kresko asset being paid back to the protocol by the liquidator.
params.seizedCollateralAsset: The address of the collateral asset being seized from the account by the liquidator.

params.minimumCollateralizationRatio: The new minimum collateralization ratio raw value.

params.secondsUntilStalePrice: The new seconds until stale price value.

params.isTrusted: true if the contract was added, false if removed

addCollateralAsset(address,uint256,addre.details: Only callable by the owner and cannot be called more than once for an asset.

params._collateralAsset: The address of the collateral asset.
params._factor: The collateral factor of the collateral asset as a raw value for a FixedPoint.Unsigned. Must be <= 1e18.
params._oracle: The oracle address for the collateral asset's USD value.

addKreskoAsset(address,string,uint256,ad.details: Only callable by the owner and cannot be called more than once for a given symbol.

params._kFactor: The k-factor of the Kresko asset as a raw value for a FixedPoint.Unsigned. Must be >= 1e18.
params._kreskoAsset: The address of the Kresko asset.
params._marketCapUSDLimit: The initial market capitalization USD limit for the Kresko asset.
params._oracle: The oracle address for the Kresko asset.
params._symbol: The symbol of the Kresko asset.

params._account: The address to burn kresko assets for
params._amount: The amount of the Kresko asset to be burned.
params._kreskoAsset: The address of the Kresko asset.
params._mintedKreskoAssetIndex: The index of the collateral asset in the user's minted assets array.

calculateMaxLiquidatableValueForAssets(a.details: Calculates the total value that can be liquidated for a liquidation pair

params._collateralAssetToSeize: address of the collateral asset being seized from the liquidatee
params._repayKreskoAsset: address of the kreskoAsset being repaid on behalf of the liquidatee

returns.maxLiquidatableUSD: USD value that can be liquidated, 0 if the pair has no liquidatable value

constructor.details: Protects against a call to initialize when this contract is called directly without a proxy.

params._account: The user to deposit collateral for.
params._amount: The amount of the collateral asset to deposit.
params._collateralAsset: The address of the collateral asset.

params._account: The user to deposit collateral for.
params._collateralAsset: The address of the NonRebasingWrapperToken collateral asset.
params._rebasingAmount: The amount of the underlying rebasing token to deposit.

getAccountCollateralValue(address).details: O(# of different deposited collateral assets by account) complexity.

params._account: The account to calculate the collateral value for.

returns._0: The collateral value of a particular account.

params._account: The account to calculate the Kresko asset value for.

returns._0: The Kresko asset value of a particular account.

getAccountMinimumCollateralValue(address.details: Accounts that have their collateral value under the minimum collateral value are considered unhealthy and therefore to avoid liquidations users should maintain a collateral value higher than the value returned.

params._account: The account to calculate the minimum collateral value for.

returns._0: The minimum collateral value of a particular account.

params._amount: The amount of the collateral asset to calculate the collateral value for.
params._collateralAsset: The address of the collateral asset.
params._ignoreCollateralFactor: Boolean indicating if the asset's collateral factor should be ignored.

returns._0: The collateral value for the provided amount of the collateral asset.

params._account: The account to get the index for.

returns.i: = index of the minted collateral asset.

params._account: The account to get the deposited collateral assets for.

returns._0: An array of addresses of collateral assets the account has deposited.

params._amount: The amount of the Kresko asset to calculate the value for.
params._ignoreKFactor: Boolean indicating if the asset's k-factor should be ignored.
params._kreskoAsset: The address of the Kresko asset.

returns._0: The value for the provided amount of the Kresko asset.

params._krAsset: The address of the Kresko asset.

returns.minCollateralValue: is the minimum collateral value required for this Kresko Asset amount.

params._account: The account to get the minted Kresko assets for.

returns._0: An array of addresses of Kresko assets the account has minted.

params._account: The account to get the minted Kresko assets for.

returns.i: = index of the minted Kresko asset.

params._burnFee: Initial burn fee as a raw value for a FixedPoint.Unsigned.
params._minimumCollateralizationRatio: Initial collateralization ratio as a raw value for a FixedPoint.Unsigned.
params._minimumDebtValue: Initial minimum debt value denominated in USD.

isAccountLiquidatable(address).details: Returns true if the account's current collateral value is below the minimum collateral value required to consider the position healthy.

returns._0: A boolean indicating if the account can be liquidated.

params._account: The account to attempt to liquidate.
params._collateralAssetToSeize: The address of the collateral asset to be seized.
params._depositedCollateralAssetIndex: Index of the collateral asset in the account's collateral assets array.
params._keepKrAssetDebt: Liquidator can choose to receive the whole seized amount keeping the krAsset debt. Setting _keepKrAssetDebt to false will instead only send the incentive and repay krAsset debt.
params._mintedKreskoAssetIndex: The index of the Kresko asset in the account's minted assets array.
params._repayAmount: The amount of the Kresko asset to be repaid.
params._repayKreskoAsset: The address of the Kresko asset to be repaid.

params._account: The address to mint assets for.
params._amount: The amount of the Kresko asset to be minted.
params._kreskoAsset: The address of the Kresko asset.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

params._trustedContract: Contract to toggle the trusted status for.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._burnFee: The new burn fee as a raw value for a FixedPoint.Unsigned.

params._collateralAsset: The address of the collateral asset.
params._factor: The new collateral factor as a raw value for a FixedPoint.Unsigned. Must be <= 1e18.
params._oracle: The new oracle address for the collateral asset.

params._kFactor: The new k-factor as a raw value for a FixedPoint.Unsigned. Must be >= 1e18.
params._kreskoAsset: The address of the Kresko asset.
params._marketCapUSDLimit: The new market capitalization USD limit.
params._oracle: The new oracle address for the Kresko asset's USD value.

params._minimumCollateralizationRatio: The new minimum collateralization ratio as a raw value for a FixedPoint.Unsigned.

updateMinimumDebtValue(uint256).details: Updates the contract's minimum debt value.

params._minimumDebtValue: The new minimum debt value as a raw value for a FixedPoint.Unsigned.

updateSecondsUntilStalePrice(uint256).details: Updates the contract's seconds until stale price value

params._secondsUntilStalePrice: The new seconds until stale price.

withdrawCollateral(address,address,uint2.details: Requires the post-withdrawal collateral value to violate minimum collateral requirement.

params._account: The address to withdraw assets for.
params._amount: The amount of the collateral asset to withdraw.
params._collateralAsset: The address of the collateral asset.
params._depositedCollateralAssetIndex: The index of the collateral asset in the sender's deposited collateral assets array. Only needed if withdrawing the entire deposit of a particular collateral asset.

params._account: The address to withdraw assets for.
params._amount: The amount of the NonRebasingWrapperToken collateral asset to withdraw.
params._collateralAsset: The address of the NonRebasingWrapperToken collateral asset.
params._depositedCollateralAssetIndex: The index of the collateral asset in the sender's deposited collateral assets array. Only needed if withdrawing the entire deposit of a particular collateral asset.

devdoc.title: The core of the Kresko protocol.

BurnFeePaid(address,address,uint256,uint.notice: Emitted when an account pays a burn fee with a collateral asset upon burning a Kresko asset.

BurnFeeUpdated(uint256).notice: Emitted when the burn fee is updated.

CollateralAssetAdded(address,uint256,add.notice: Emitted when a collateral asset is added to the protocol.

CollateralAssetUpdated(address,uint256,a.notice: Emitted when a collateral asset is updated.

CollateralDeposited(address,address,uint.notice: Emitted when an account deposits collateral.

CollateralWithdrawn(address,address,uint.notice: Emitted when an account withdraws collateral.

FeeRecipientUpdated(address).notice: Emitted when the fee recipient is updated.

KreskoAssetAdded(address,string,uint256,.notice: Emitted when a Kresko asset is added to the protocol.

KreskoAssetBurned(address,address,uint25.notice: Emitted when an account burns a Kresko asset.

KreskoAssetMinted(address,address,uint25.notice: Emitted when an account mints a Kresko asset.

KreskoAssetUpdated(address,uint256,addre.notice: Emitted when a Kresko asset's oracle is updated.

LiquidationIncentiveMultiplierUpdated(ui.notice: Emitted when the liquidation incentive multiplier is updated.

MinimumCollateralizationRatioUpdated(uin.notice: Emitted when the minimum collateralization ratio is updated.

MinimumDebtValueUpdated(uint256).notice: Emitted when the minimum debt value updated.

SecondsUntilStalePriceUpdated(uint256).notice: Emitted when the seconds until stale price value is updated.

TrustedContract(address,bool).notice: Emitted when the a trusted contract is added/removed.

MAX_DEBT_VALUE().notice: The maximum configurable minimum debt USD value.

MAX_LIQUIDATION_INCENTIVE_MULTIPLIER().notice: The maximum configurable liquidation incentive multiplier. This means liquidator receives 25% bonus collateral compared to the debt repaid.

MIN_COLLATERALIZATION_RATIO().notice: The minimum configurable minimum collateralization ratio.

MIN_LIQUIDATION_INCENTIVE_MULTIPLIER().notice: The minimum configurable liquidation incentive multiplier. This means liquidator only receives equal amount of collateral to debt repaid.

addCollateralAsset(address,uint256,addre.notice: Adds a collateral asset to the protocol.

addKreskoAsset(address,string,uint256,ad.notice: Adds a Kresko asset to the protocol.

burnFee().notice: The percent fee imposed upon the value of burned krAssets, taken as collateral and sent to feeRecipient.

burnKreskoAsset(address,address,uint256,.notice: Burns existing Kresko assets.Only needed if withdrawing the entire deposit of a particular collateral asset.

claimOwnership().notice: Needs to be called by pending owner to claim ownership.

collateralAssets(address).notice: Mapping of collateral asset token address to information on the collateral asset.

collateralDeposits(address,address).notice: Mapping of account address to a mapping of collateral asset token address to the amount of the collateral asset the account has deposited.

collateralExists(address).notice: Returns true if the @param _collateralAsset exists in the protocol

depositRebasingCollateral(address,addres.notice: Deposits a rebasing collateral into the protocol by wrapping the underlying rebasing token.

depositedCollateralAssets(address,uint25.notice: Mapping of account address to an array of the addresses of each collateral asset the account has deposited.

getAccountCollateralValue(address).notice: Gets the collateral value of a particular account.

getAccountKrAssetValue(address).notice: Gets the Kresko asset value in USD of a particular account.

getAccountMinimumCollateralValue(address.notice: Gets an account's minimum collateral value for its Kresko Asset debts.

getCollateralValueAndOraclePrice(address.notice: Gets the collateral value for a single collateral asset and amount.

getDepositedCollateralAssetIndex(address.notice: Gets an index for the collateral asset the account has deposited.

getDepositedCollateralAssets(address).notice: Gets an array of collateral assets the account has deposited.

getKrAssetValue(address,uint256,bool).notice: Gets the USD value for a single Kresko asset and amount.

getMinimumCollateralValue(address,uint25.notice: Get the minimum collateral value required to keep a individual debt position healthy.

getMintedKreskoAssets(address).notice: Gets an array of Kresko assets the account has minted.

getMintedKreskoAssetsIndex(address,addre.notice: Gets an index for the Kresko asset the account has minted.

isAccountLiquidatable(address).notice: Calculates if an account's current collateral value is under its minimum collateral value

krAssetExists(address).notice: Returns true if the @param _krAsset exists in the protocol

kreskoAssetDebt(address,address).notice: Mapping of account address to a mapping of Kresko asset token address to the amount of the Kresko asset the account has minted and therefore owes to the protocol.

kreskoAssetSymbols(string).notice: Mapping of Kresko asset symbols to whether the symbol is used by an existing Kresko asset.

kreskoAssets(address).notice: Mapping of Kresko asset token address to information on the Kresko asset.

liquidate(address,address,uint256,addres.notice: Attempts to liquidate an account by repaying the portion of the account's Kresko asset         debt, receiving in return a portion of the account's collateral at a discounted rate.

liquidationIncentiveMultiplier().notice: The factor used to calculate the incentive a liquidator receives in the form of seized collateral.

minimumCollateralizationRatio().notice: The absolute minimum ratio of collateral value to debt value that is used to calculate collateral requirements.

minimumDebtValue().notice: The minimum USD value of an individual synthetic asset debt position.

mintedKreskoAssets(address,uint256).notice: Mapping of account address to an array of the addresses of each Kresko asset the account has minted.

secondsUntilStalePrice().notice: The number of seconds until a price is considered stale

toggleTrustedContract(address).notice: Toggles a trusted contract to perform actions on behalf of user (eg. Kresko Zapper).

updateCollateralAsset(address,uint256,ad.notice: Updates a previously added collateral asset.

updateKreskoAsset(address,uint256,addres.notice: Updates the k-factor of a previously added Kresko asset.

withdrawCollateral(address,address,uint2.notice: Withdraws sender's collateral from the protocol.

withdrawRebasingCollateral(address,addre.notice: Withdraws NonRebasingWrapperToken collateral from the protocol and unwraps it.

userdoc.notice: Responsible for managing collateral and minting / burning overcollateralized synthetic assets called Kresko assets. Management of critical features such as adding new collateral assets / Kresko assets and updating protocol constants such as the burn fee minimum collateralization ratio, and liquidation incentive is restricted to the contract owner.
